descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to classical and schemetheoretic methods of algebraic geometry. Algebraic vector bundles, sheaf cohomology, the Riemann-Roch theorem for curves, and intersection theory.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0471050599 Principles of Algebraic Geometry
Griffiths and Harris
Wiley
